column1: Local Foods////I love Local Foods. The decor
column7: and the list goes on. I've been here quite a few times and it's always exactly how I remember it. The sandwiches are my favorite and I have a few go-tos. THE TRUFFLED EGG SALAD SANDWICH. I'm not joking. Believe me
column8: I hate egg salad. The only reason I ever ordered this sandwich in the first place is because my mind usually goes blank and I stop reading anything and immediately order after I hear the word 'truffle.' This sandwich is my favorite. The egg salad isn't too 'strong' and the truffle flavor really comes through. Also
column9: I'm a huge fan of anything on that pretzel bun.
